text: The Specialist is a 1994 American action thriller movie. Sylvester Stallone plays Ray. Sharon Stone plays May Munro. This movie is about a former CIA agent getting mixed up in violence, drugs and deception. It is set in Colombia and Miami. Many critics did not like the movie. Its box office intake, however, was positive. The movie was released on October 7, 1994. == Other websites == * * Category:1994 thriller movies Category:1994 action movies Category:1990s spy movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:American spy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about revenge Category:Movies set in Colombia Category:Movies set in Miami Category:Movies directed by Luis Llosa
title: The Specialist
